Class Building

java.lang.Object
com.mygdx.game.Entitys.Entity
com.mygdx.game.Entitys.Building
All Implemented Interfaces:
CollisionCallBack
public class Building
extends Entity
implements CollisionCallBack
Buildings that you see in game.

    • makeDefender

      public void makeDefender()
      Marks building as one that can shoot at player and adds a trigger for the player entering within aggro range.

    • getHealth

      public int getHealth()

    • destroy

      private void destroy()
      Replace the building with ruins and mark as broken.

    • update

      public void update()
      Called on every frame, does nothing for non - defenders (buildings incapable of shooting) For defenders, waits 3 seconds and shoots at player if within agro range. For defenders, updates healthbar to reflect current health level.
      Overrides:
      update in class Entity

    • revive

      public void revive()
      Used on reset of the game screen. Sets health back to 100 and, if destroyed, changes the sprite back to undestroyed version

    • isAlive

      public boolean isAlive()

      EndContact in interface CollisionCallBack

    • EnterTrigger

      public void EnterTrigger​(CollisionInfo info)
      If the building is not a defender (doesnt shoot at player), kills the building and the cannonball that hit it. Otherwise harms the building and kills the cannonball For defenders, player entering the aggro range makes the building add it as a target.
      Specified by:
      EnterTrigger in interface CollisionCallBack
      Parameters:
      info - CollisionInfo container

    • ExitTrigger

      public void ExitTrigger​(CollisionInfo info)
      For defender buildings, the player leaving the aggro range removes the target from the building's list of targets
      Specified by:
      ExitTrigger in interface CollisionCallBack
      Parameters:
      info - CollisionInfo container

    • hide

      public void hide()
